verses.roman:
udyāne udyāne bhramena kautuka dekhite
rāsa-līlāra gīta-śloka paḍite śunite

synonyms: udyāne udyāne—from garden to garden; bhramena—He walks; kautuka dekhite—seeing the fun; rāsa-līlāra—of the rāsa dance; gīta-śloka—songs and verses; paḍite śunite—reciting and hearing.
translation: He walked from garden to garden, seeing the pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa and hearing and reciting songs and verses concerning the rāsa-līlā.
